testcase.name: verify of the place is being successfully added using the AddPlaceAPI - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload with "home one" "English" "One World Alliance"......passed When user calls "addPlaceAPI" with "POST" http request......................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And "scope" in response body is "APP".......................................passed And verify place_ID created maps to "home one" using "getPlaceAPI"..........passed

testcase.name: verify of the place is being successfully added using the AddPlaceAPI - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload with "home two" "Tamil" "Poongavanam"...............passed When user calls "addPlaceAPI" with "POST" http request......................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And "scope" in response body is "APP".......................................passed And verify place_ID created maps to "home two" using "getPlaceAPI"..........passed

testcase.name: Verify if Delete Place functionality is working
testcase.system-out: Given deletePalce Payload...................................................passed When user calls "deletePlaceAPI" with "POST" http request...................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed
